name: Trendsetter API Tests
description: This is a collection of tests for the [Trendsetter REST API](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/220187/trendsetter-api/2MuEBW).  All of the tests are written in [Postman BDD](https://github.com/BigstickCarpet/postman-bdd#postman-bdd).
